name: arxiv_scrape_paper
description: Scrape a specific arXiv paper. Returns title, authors, full abstract, categories, and PDF link.

steps.code: const title = document.querySelector('h1.title')?.textContent?.replace('Title:', '')?.trim() || ''; const authors = []; document.querySelectorAll('.authors a').forEach(a => authors.push(a.textContent?.trim())); const abstract = document.querySelector('blockquote.abstract')?.textContent?.replace('Abstract:', '')?.trim() || ''; const cats = document.querySelector('.tablecell.subjects')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const dateEl = document.querySelector('.dateline')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const pdfLink = 'https://arxiv.org/pdf/{{paper_id}}'; return { paper_id: '{{paper_id}}', title, authors, abstract, categories: cats, date: dateEl, pdf_link: pdfLink, url: window.location.href };
